title: How to Create a Discord Account on a PC or Mac

steps.title: Go to https://www.discordapp.com.
steps.content: Go to https://www.discordapp.com . You can use any web browser, such as Chrome or Safari, to create a Discord account.

steps.title: Click Login.
steps.content: Click Login . It’s at the top-right corner of the screen.

steps.title: Click Register.
steps.content: Click Register . It’s right beneath the large blue “Login” button.

steps.title: Fill out the form.
steps.content: Fill out the form. You’ll have to provide your email address, a username/handle, and a password to create your account.

steps.title: Click the square next to “I am not a robot.”
steps.content: Click the square next to “I am not a robot.” You will now be taken to the Discord home screen. Additionally, Discord will send you an email to verify your account. If you see a pop-up ad for Discord, click the “X” at its top-right corner.

steps.title: Click Get Started or Skip.
steps.content: Click Get Started or Skip . If you want to start adding friends and servers now, click Get Started to run through the setup process. If you want to wait until later, click Skip .

steps.title: Open the email from Discord.
steps.content: Open the email from Discord. Some welcome text and a large button will appear.

steps.title: Click Verify Email.
steps.content: Click Verify Email . This will open Discord once again. If you are prompted to prove you’re not a robot again, click the check box to continue.

steps.title: Click Verify.
steps.content: Click Verify . You are now ready to start using Discord. For tips on getting started, see Get Started with Discord .
